content: **this full pattern is available as free-to-view over on my blog https //hookedonpatterns com/crochet-blog/free-crochet-coaster-pattern-heart** > also available as a video tutorial on > youtube here > https //youtu be/k0mxwfgjori these cute heart shaped coasters are super quick and easy to make they are made in only 6 rounds the blog posts gives a step by step guide through with photos perfect for beginners or if you are more experienced you can just skip to the bottom for the full written pattern this is a simple project great for using up your scrap cotton aran/worsted weight yarns they only use around 10g each that s less than 20 yds they would make a great table filler for craft stalls too finished coasters measure approx 4 x 4 5 inches help us provide more free crochet patterns by simply sharing the link to this free pattern with your crochet friends or even beginners learning to crochet you can also find quick social share buttons at the bottom of the post thank you for your support i hope you enjoy making these coasters
